About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment Monday to Friday 9am - 5pm; closed on weekends, Christmas to New Year and Public Holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for original records to A3.

About.Access: Access to the Archives is by appointment only, with advance notice of one week (preferably written) required stating the purpose of the research.

About.Acquisition focus: Records of current and past students and staff of RMIT University and merged institutes and colleges including State College of Victoria (Coburg); Preston Institute of Technology; Phillip Institute of Technology; Emily McPherson College, Melbourne College of Printing and Graphic Arts; and Melbourne Institute of Textiles.

About.Major holdings:
Photographic Collection from 1887
	Prospectus Books, Calendars & Handbooks
	Correspondence & Subject Files
	Committees & Boards Magazines, Newsletters & Journals
	Staff & Student Records

About.References:
Stephen Murray-Smith and Anthony John Dare, The Tech. A Centenary of the Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology, Hyland House, Melbourne, 1987.
	Brian Carroll, A Decade of Achievement - Phillip Institute of Technology, RMIT Press, Abbotsford, Victoria, 1995.
	James Docherty, The Emily Mac - The story of The Emily McPherson College 1906-1979, Ormond, 1981.
	Bill Anderson, Threads. AÂ History of the Melbourne Institute of Textiles 1949-1998, Melbourne Institute of Textiles, 1998.

Contact.Street address: Building 253, Level 1, Room 32, RMIT Bundoora East Campus, Plenty Road, Bundoora
